bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: [GCP] Cloud Endpoints manifest doesn't support overriding the image
bug.description:
There is a bug in the cloud endpoints ksonnet manifest.
kubeflow/kubeflow/gcp/cloud-endpoints.libsonnet
Line 4 in a9a9ef2
local params = _params + _env {
The default value doesn't get overwritten by the params value. This is a problem when using Secure VPC and private GKE because we need to mirror the image into a private registry. (We could also put the image into gcr.io/kubeflow-images-public so each user doesn't need to mirror it). We should cherry-pick this onto 0.5.
